About

Hi, My name is Amr Eldib. Welcome to my blog and website.
I’m a software developer working in the GIS field. Egyptian living in Vancouver, Canada.
Follow me on Twitter @AmrEldib, or LinkedIn.
Join in for some coding on GitHub.
Or, browse my book shelf on Goodreads.
To get updates for this blog, subscribe via RSS.
